description_text:
Salve vorrei sapere informazioni sul mio ordine  vorrei sapere a se è stato
spedito grazie  attendo vostre notizie

*Alessandro Siragusano*

conversations.body_text: Hi Alessandro Siragusano,  Could you please provide your order number so we can check it for you?

Salve il mio numero di ordine e Order #SSN5846
 Attendo informazioni grazie
*Alessandro Siragusano*

Il Dom 11 Gen 2026, 07:08 support@simsonn.com

Avete qualche novità??  Order #SSN5846

*Alessandro Siragusano*

Il Dom 11 Gen 2026, 12:51 Alessandro Siragusano <
siragusanoalessandro@gmail.com> ha scritto:

> Salve il mio numero di ordine e Order #SSN5846
>  Attendo informazioni grazie
> *Alessandro Siragusano*
>
> Il Dom 11 Gen 2026, 07:08 support@simsonn.com

Hi Alessandro Siragusano,     One of the items in your package has been shipped today. Below is your tracking link:  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3265828359915     Another product，Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047239668663

Salve posso sapere cosa non e stato spedito?.. e che tempi di attesa ci
sono

*Alessandro Siragusano*

Il Gio 15 Gen 2026, 08:12 support@simsonn.com

Hi Alessandro Siragusano,  I am very pleased to inform you that,I found that all your orders have been shipped, and they are expected to arrive around the 24th.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3265828359915  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047239668663
